author: Ellen Gamerman
title: ‘A Quiet Place,’ a Nearly Silent Movie, Makes Noise Ahead of Its Opening - WSJ
text:
“A Quiet Place,” about creatures that kill anyone who screams, is generating an unusual amount of pop-culture noise before hitting theaters Friday.
The horror movie, centered on a family battling demons that have supersonic hearing, sparked a flood of mentions on social media and glowing reviews after its premiere at the SXSW Film Festival in March. It currently enjoys a 100% “fresh” rating on the movie-review site Rotten Tomatoes.
